title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jaco Booyens & Vera Sharav | 8/29/22
description:
Glenn and Stu rant about the desperate attempt to criminalize former President Donald Trump. BlazeTV contributor Jaco Booyens joins to expose the changes being suggested to Texas schools' curriculum. Holocaust survivor Vera Sharav discusses the importance of the Nuremberg Code and its relation to the COVID-19 vaccine. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
